title: Tousan na, Death Game Unei de Kutteiru n da
original_name: 父さんな、デスゲーム運営で食っているんだ
sinopse:
The year 20XX, a time when the "Death Game" has become important. A large number of people participate in them in search of great prizes. FATHER, the greatest administrator of death games, is the place where Eiji Kurosaki works as general manager of that division. This manga follows the life in the working world of Eiji Kurosaki and the problems he must endure in his job while hiding his work from his family.

(Source: MU)
